data.text: Ngʼat masiko katoke tek bangʼ siem mangʼeny
Ka joma kare dhiyo nyime, ji mor,
Ngʼat mohero rieko miyo wuon mare mor,
Gi adiera ema ruoth miyo piny bet mochungʼ motegno,
Ngʼat mawuondo jabute
Ngʼat marach dwodore e obadho mar richone owuon,
Ngʼat makare winjo ywak jochan mondo otimnegi gima kare,
Joma jaro ji kelo koko e dala,
Ka ngʼat mariek odhiyo gi ngʼat mofuwo e od bura,
Joma ohero chwero remo mon kod jogo modimbore,
Ngʼat mofuwo chiwore duto komwomore amwoma e mirimbe,
Ka ruoth thoro chiko ite ne miriambo,
Jachan gi ngʼat mahinyo ji nigi gimoro achiel machalre:
Ka ruoth ongʼado bura ne jochan kod adiera,
Ka ichwado nyathi kendo ikwere eka ikonye bedo mariek
Ka jaricho dhiyo nyime maber, e kaka richo bende medore,
Kum wuodi, to obiro miyi kwe;
Kama onge lek, to ji chunygi aa
Misumba ok nyal kony kirieye mana gi wach kende;
Bende ineno ngʼato ma wuoyo ka rikni mapiyo piyo?
Ka ngʼato omiyo misumbane gik moko duto chakre ka en rawera,
Ngʼat ma iye owangʼ kelo masira,
Sunga ngʼato ema miyo opodho,
Ngʼat makonyo jakuo mondo okwal ema bedo jasike owuon;
Luoro mar dhano biro nyisore ni en gima duodo ngʼato,
Ji mangʼeny dwaro mondo girom gi ruoth,
Joma kare mon gi joma ok jo-adiera,
